name: Jetpack Explorer
description:
Welcome to Jetpack Explorer, 

the thrilling space adventure game where you take on the role of a space mining facility commander! Your mission is to save your mining site from the clutches of a rogue AI that has become self-aware, and is now controlling turrets and robots to attack you.

You'll need to navigate the treacherous mines, filled with obstacles and deadly traps, while fending off the AI's minions with your trusty jetpack. But that's not all – you must also find a special type of fuel crystal to power your ship and make your escape.

Will you be able to outsmart the AI and save your life, or will you fall victim to its relentless pursuit? Strap on your jetpack and get ready for an epic space adventure in Jetpack Explorer!

Modifications made:

  1. I reskinned the score pickup model to look like a delicious doughnut! Why are there doughnuts in space? We don't know!
  2. A completely new cave level filled with traps!
  3. I created new music for the cave level and swapped other music assets with royalty-free songs I found.

Brought to you by: A. Malarev & Sutherlandgames with assets from MSU for a game development course.

Music: 

"Space Jazz" by Kevin McLeod

"Cant stop my feet" - loyalty freak music

"The dark cave" - Anton Malarev
